overview: land and flower is a short film and eulogy of the tallgrass prairie landscape made to remember the lands lost and the flowers that remain. Adapted from a poem by Megan Kaminski, land and flower by David Wayne Reed is an artful acknowledgment of the vibrant native prairie, an emergent benediction, and a call to the conservation of this rare and endangered ecosystem. Original Score by The Wires.
tagline: These flowers, this land, this longing to hold on to what cannot be held.
title: land and flower
